overview:
Matt is a co-founder of RebelVox and leads technical design work.

Matt founded Ranney Consulting Services, providing creative network architecture solutions and operations services for large web applications, backbone networks, and Internet Telephony deployments. His expertise extends deep into network protocols and systems, enabling him to design and deploy complex, high-performance networks under challenging constraints. Matt has delivered projects for a number of different companies including NEC, HP, Nortel, Level 3, ChevronTexaco, NBC, Homestore, and Triple Canopy. Matt received a BSCS from Calvin College in Grand Rapids, MI.
